amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the USDA Office of Inspector General by $1 million and reduces funding for the Office of the Secretary by a similar mount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Office of Inspector General by $1 million and to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary by a similar mount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Thompson (CA).
